item.title: Fuuzle offers a free news consolidation service that translates content into 26 different languages
item.description:
Fuuzle simplifies information retrieval by gathering and providing access to the content of countless newsletters and RSS feeds worldwide, translating them into 26 languages with a high level of accuracy. Fuuzle claims that some of this information is difficult or impossible to find using traditional search engines. Source: Fuuzle website. Currently in beta, the company’s database expands by over 100 million unique RSS feeds and more than 5 million newsletters monthly...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/fuuzle-offers-a-free-news-consolidation-service-that-translates-content-into-26-different-languages/

item.title: The Global Day of Discovery at Renaissance Hotels worldwide is celebrated on June 26th
item.description:
Renaissance Hotels is hosting its third annual Global Day of Discovery on June 26th at over 150 locations. On this day, almost every hotel will offer guests and community members the opportunity to explore something new. These events, designed by hotel Navigators, include musical performances, culinary experiences, art displays, cultural activities, and unique local excursions. This day marks the start of the Renaissance Hotels’ Summer of Discovery calendar, a summer-long series of exclusive events at all 157 hotels worldwide...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-global-day-of-discovery-at-renaissance-hotels-worldwide-is-celebrated-on-june-26th/
